questions.question_text: Which is a unique capability of Meraki MX?

discussion.content:
Correct answer is D, Here are some of the key benefits of the Meraki MX series:
• Access to the proverbial ‘single pane of glass’ management for full stack branch infrastructure
• Security and hybrid WAN management (SD-WAN) delivered in a single box
• Designed for Cloud management
• Intuitive, GUI-based configuration and monitoring

Selected Answer: D
